
XwaOptEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)

XwaOptExplorer runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)

OptStructure runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)

OptTextures runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)

XwaHangarMapEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)

XwaOptProfilesViewer runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)

XwaSFoilsEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.8.
(Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 or superior)
